text:
="preserve">Image:Nikki Reed Comic-Con 4, 2012.jpg|thumb|Nikki Reed
Nicole "Nikki" Reed (born May 17 1988) is an American movie actress. She has been featured mostly in independent movies. She was first brought to fame in 2003 with "Thirteen".
Reed was born in Los Angeles, California. She is of Ashkenazi Jewish, Cherokee Native American, English, French, German, Irish, Italian, Scottish, Swiss and Welsh descent.
